from sys import stdin

N = int(stdin.readline())
A = list(map(int, stdin.readline().split()))

for i in range(N):
    print(abs(A[i - 1] - A[i]) + abs(A[i + 1] - A[i]) if i != 0 and i != N - 1 else
          abs(A[i - 1] - A[i]) + abs(A[i + 1] - A[i]) + abs(A[i + 1] - A[i - 1]) if i == 0 else
          abs(A[i - 1] - A[i]) + abs(A[i + 1] - A[i]) + abs(A[i - 1] - A[i + 1]))

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

for i in range(n):
    print(sum(map(abs, [a[i]] + a[i+1:] + a[:i])))

n, *a = [int(_) for _ in input().split()]

for i in range(n):
    x = a[i]
    left = sum(abs(x - a[j]) for j in range(i))
    right = sum(abs(x - a[j]) for j in range(i + 1, n))
    print(left + right)
